instruction:
Given the following job description, create a tailored resume:

Job Title: AI and Machine Learning Engineer Internship

Job Description:
ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER
New PropTech startup company looking for Data Scientists with experience and skills related to artificial intelligence and machine learning.  The company is seeking new and innovative ways to visualize the world’s property markets and provide guidance and analytical abilities related to predicting movements in the world's real estate markets.
Your day-to-day:
Working with business analysts and engineers to understand the requirements
Machine Learning model building, training, validation and tuning
Explore & Visualize the data to gain better insights and identifying differences in data distribution to address the model performance challenges
Researching, evaluating and exploring various AL and ML algorithms
Use machine learning, data mining, predictive modelling & statistical techniques to create new scalable models for business requirements
Research and implement data mining machine learning algorithms in supervised and unsupervised learning areas
Validating model inputs/ outputs & accuracy
Integrate appropriate models into a commercial Production system, and support its operation, once live
We’d love to hear from you if you have:
A Bachelor's degree or above, in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (STEM degree)
Excellent software engineering skills, particularly in large-scale applications, including API definitions, multi-threading, database connectivity, and object-orientation development.
Experience with Machine Learning algorithms
Experience dealing with both structured & unstructured datasets and drawing the insights from the data
Good understanding of the statistical methods – sampling, modelling
Working experience with some or all languages of Python, Java, C++ & their respective AI\ML libraries
Experience with text analytics & NLP libraries
Excellent communication skills
Ability to work with an international team
Strong background in statistical concepts and calculations
The expected pay rate ranges from $1,000 to $2,000, depending on experience.
We accept interns for a minimum duration of 2 months, with a preference for commitments of 3 to 4 months.

Please create a tailored resume that highlights relevant skills and experience for this position.
output:
Here is a tailored resume for the AI and Machine Learning Engineer Internship position:

SATHVIK ADDICHARLA
Denton, TX 76207 | sathvikaddicharla@my.unt.edu | +1 (940) 597-5745 | [LinkedIn] | [GitHub]
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Data science and machine learning graduate student with hands-on experience building predictive models, NLP pipelines, and real-time inference systems using Python and open-source ML frameworks. Strong foundation in statistics, text analytics, and structured/unstructured data processing. Experience collaborating with engineering and product teams in startup environments. Passionate about applying AI to real-world domains like finance and real estate to drive predictive insight and intelligent automation.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
Programming: Python, SQL, C++, Java (basic)
NLP & Text Analytics: Hugging Face Transformers, SpaCy, LangChain, Whisper
Data Handling: Pandas, NumPy, OpenCV, FAISS, Time-series visualization, EDA
ML Lifecycle & Deployment: MLflow, Docker, REST API, Flask
Statistical Concepts: Regression, Sampling, Modeling, Confidence Intervals, Tuning
Collaboration: Agile/Scrum, Cross-functional Communication, GitHub
EDUCATION
Master’s in Data Science
University of North Texas | 04/2024 – 08/2026 | GPA: 3.66/4.0
Bachelor’s in Computer Science – Data Science
VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Technology, India | GPA: 8.60/10
EXPERIENCE
AI/ML Engineer Intern
Cantellate Software Pvt Ltd | Hyderabad, India | 03/2023 – 09/2023
Developed and validated predictive models on large tabular datasets (500GB+) using PyTorch and Scikit-learn.
Designed NLP-based retrieval systems using Hugging Face + FAISS; improved content relevance by 75%.
Performed statistical validation and performance tracking of models through MLflow and custom evaluation scripts.
Built fraud detection systems and anomaly classifiers with high-accuracy thresholds (>95%) for business insights.
Collaborated with analysts and engineers to align ML outcomes with product goals in a lean, iterative workflow.
PROJECTS
Real-Time NLP Chatbot for Diagnostics (IEEE Publication)
Used LangChain and Transformers for text-based medical diagnosis assistant; integrated retrieval & summarization.
Focused on prompt design, token stream filtering, and statistical evaluation of output accuracy.
YouTube Summarizer with Whisper + FAISS
Transcribed and summarized structured/unstructured audio-visual content; enabled fast semantic search with vector DB.
Used time-based performance logging and user relevance scores for validation (~92% average rating).
Speech Emotion Detection using LSTM + MFCC
Trained model on time-series audio features (MFCC), used attention mechanisms to improve emotion classification.
Applied advanced EDA and sampling techniques to handle class imbalance and diverse accents.
CERTIFICATIONS & TRAINING
Python for Data Science and Machine Learning – Udemy
Training LLMs with Your Own Data – DeepLearning.ai
Deep Learning – NPTEL (IIT Ropar)
Google Data Analytics – Coursera
PUBLICATIONS
RAG-Based Chatbot for Diagnosis – IEEE (09/2024)
Transfer Learning for Autism Detection in Children – IEEE (08/2024)
